Use The method overriding Entity::create() for the entity type, e.g. \Drupal\node\Entity\Node::create() if the entity type is known. If the entity type is variable, use the entity storage's create() method to construct a new entity:
Add core_version_requirement: ^8 || ^9 to tmgmt_yandex_api.info.yml to designate that the module is compatible with Drupal 9. See https://www.drupal.org/node/3070687.
A drupal/core requirement is not present in composer.json. Having a composer.json is not a requirement for Drupal 9 compatibility but if there is one, it should include a drupal/core requirement.
